alert.note: Alert for Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 11 at 1:19PM PST until February 13 at 6:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 6 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern half of the Owens Valley primarily between Lone Pine and Pearsonville. * WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to 6 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving difficult... especially for motorcycles and high profile vehicles and may create areas of blowing dust or sand. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
